com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.vic

Class VicService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.vic.VicService

  • public class VicService
extends Object
    VicService is the entry-point for VIC features.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static VicService create(OtpModule module)
      Create VicService.
      VicFactory getFactory()
      Returns Factory for creating VIC settings and VIC devices.
      VicTokenManager getTokenManager()
      Returns TokenManager for VIC tokens.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static VicService create(OtpModule module)
        Create VicService. IdpCore needs to be configured and OtpModule needs to be created before creating VicService.
        Parameters:
        module -
        Returns:
        vicService
        Throws:
        ActivationException - when the activation code supplied on IdpCore.configure(byte[], IdpConfiguration...) or IdpCore.configure(boolean, byte[], IdpConfiguration...) does not have the VIC feature turned on.

      • getTokenManager

        public VicTokenManager getTokenManager()
        Returns TokenManager for VIC tokens.
        Returns:
        VicTokenManager object.

      • getFactory

        public VicFactory getFactory()
        Returns Factory for creating VIC settings and VIC devices.
        Returns:
        VicFactory object.
